items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering. Get it. You’ll love it.
items.body: Ordered a Med based off reviews and I’m so glad I did. I’m 5’5 163 and a DD36 and truthfully there was more than enough stretch to the dress. Very flowy and fresh and so fitting at the same time. Very flattering. The square neck is slimming also. I have long arms and the sleeves were more than long enough. Quality was great and pricing was worth it. Longer than my finger tips. I’m not one to leave reviews but to be fair the reviews here helped me in my purchase so I hope I can help others. Read more
items.author: Esmeralda

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just Alright.
items.body: does the job but not a great dress. runs large, i recommend sizing down. dress is a lot longer than pictured and hem is ruffled, not straight as it looks in the listing. oddly heavy for being a mesh fabric. i ended up hand altering mine heavily. Read more
items.author: katie l

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's a cute dress but the fit is a tiny bit awkward feeling
items.body: I like this, but there is something a little strange about the cut and fit. While it ultimately works, it ends up feeling and looking slightly like it was made wrong, or you're wearing it a bit wrong (even when you aren't). The size is accurate and I didn't find it overly sheer or too short, there isn't a great deal of stretchiness so you do really want to make sure you have the right size. It's a little tight on the bodice for a very small chest, so I'm not sure how it would fit someone with a larger chest. I like that it's a basic flattering dress that's also a little bit different. It's something I could wear out for drinks and look super cute with flats or heels, or you could pair with some accessories (as pictured) and turn it into a sort of costume, like an elf dress. Read more
items.author: Sayre Alexandra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit perfect - great little black dress
items.body: Fit perfect and was very cute. You can steam our how ruffled the ends are if you want. Read more
items.author: Liz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight
items.body: Beautiful light comfy dress Nice color Read more
items.author: Irene E.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute
items.body: Its really cute but bigger then the size shown i would size down and somewhat see through Read more
items.author: Sandyv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice!
items.body: I was surprised when I took this dress out of the package. It's very pretty and cute. The fabric is soft and the dress has lining but you will probably need shapewear because it accentuates your undergarments. I would wear a skin-colored bra/underwear with this dress, this color is light enough to wear you can see through the color underneath and the lines of your underwear. I love the cut and the design of it. Wish it was a little more contoured in the waist area but it's still very flattering. I would get this in other colors. Color is accurate. Like a peachy pink shade. Fits nicely but not 100% like a glove. Nicely made. Read more
items.author: Rebecca

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, but could be more flattering.
items.body: I like this dress overall, but there's something that throws me off about it a little. I think it's the neckline. Overall, there's something that feels "girly" about it, instead of sexy and womanly, which is the look I was going for. I can't quite put my finger on it, but maybe it could be more form-fitting. Otherwise, it's cute. The quality is nice. It's very comfortable and breathable. It's lined, which prevents it from being see-through. The length is okay--I wish it were just a little shorter. Overall, it's a nice dress, but it could use some improvements, in my opinion. Maybe adding heels will dress it up a little more. Read more
items.author: Chanel

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Long Sleeve Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, Forest Green, Black Floral, Multi Floral, Green Floral, Floral Deep Blue, Royal Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Peony Red Flor, Coral Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
